website_summaries.verdict: A very good watch for divers, which is a huge asset – the price for divers' watches only goes up from this price point.
pros: This one is tough as nails as you'd expect in a G-Shock watch, but it is made with divers in mind
It's water resistant up to 200 meters, has a dive timer and offers tide and moon data
The atomic accuracy is great, too
cons: Very busy display actually shows more than you need when you're underwater

customer_reviews.title: It's a freaking Frogman. Do you need to read a review?
customer_reviews.text: This is a tank of a watch. If you were to hit this watch, it would hit you back. It's the kind of watch that shows that you are a subtle, military man, but can still look tactical AF without trying to look like a ridiculous operator. The two screws on the top and bottom are really the aesthetic selling points here. I'm not a diver, and to be honest I bought this watch just because it looked awesome and I love G-Shocks, but I can tell you that this watch is incredible in person.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware: get extra warranty if available
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware: watch needs a lot of sun time. I have had it almost a year with little issues. Light has always been on lowest time available. I Spend a good deal of time in sun/ocean. Now can’t keep it charged for more than a couple of days before low message comes on and then dies within an hour or so. Will be out of warranty within the week. Haven’t had good luck with Casio’s customer service. Wouldn’t feel right selling it. So, now I have it hanging on my wall to remind me that 500.00 of unnecessary materialism can disappoint a lot sooner than manufacturer claims. Going back to Basic Rangeman. I have learned my lesson.
customer_reviews.author: David Giri

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Big Big, Big!! I love this watch. I own 7 other G shock including Rangeman but this Frogman is Huge and well made. I am in love with this watch! You will never be disappointed with this watch. See my pics ! It is Big It is Heavy It is rough It is Well made It is well designed!
customer_reviews.author: Key

customer_reviews.title: I feel happy that I have one on my wrist
customer_reviews.text: Very solid watch. I couldn't afford the frogman when I was little (the dw8200 series) and now that I have one, I feel happy that I have one on my wrist. The watch is big, well made, and has a strong presence on the wrist. Thanks to Casio making a US model, the price is more reasonable compared to the JP version. Retail price is $700 which I think is crazy. What I paid for this watch is probably the best deal for a brand new atomic solar Frogman. I'm sure the price will go up and down on Amazon but if you can get it for <450, you gotta pull the trigger on it!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony James Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I have had Casio watches and have lived the durability of them. The frogman is no exception. It is on the larger side but it’s not overwhelmingly huge! It will go any style of clothing, and work with anything you do! I have not had a chance to use the dive feature yet, but I look forward to it! You don’t have to be a diver to enjoy the watch! I highly recommend the frogman!
customer_reviews.author: bigmike73160

customer_reviews.title: and I Love big watches
customer_reviews.text: This watch is very big and heavy, and I Love big watches! But the way it is designed, rubbed marks and was very uncomfortable on my wrist. I have to wear reading glasses sometimes, but usually not with watches. This one required reading glasses and the illumination at night was not as bright as I was hoping. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Young

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic digital watch. I am not a diver. But it’s the only digital watch I could find that didn’t look and feel like a toy. Don’t let the size scare you. More comfortable and wearable than any of the other g-shocks and easily the most comfortable strap.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is awesome! All features work perfectly & shipping was on time. It definitely has some size & weight, but isn't cumbersome. Be sure 2 keep watch in direct sunlight daily to ensure charge.
customer_reviews.author: JD Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch!! I love it. Do yourself a favor and buy one for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: James Key

customer_reviews.title: Nice Large Watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice watch but you have to have large enough wrist to wear it. Unfortunately it looked cartoonishly large on my wrist and I had to return it. If you like a large watch go for it!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Solid watch and a cut above the average G Shock ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid watch and a cut above the average G Shock watch, in terms of quality. A bit bulky though and won't fit under shirt sleeves, Also, it took several attempts to sync properly to the time signal (my other G's were fine).
customer_reviews.author: Dmw896

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: It took several days to get, but it was well worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: good watch
customer_reviews.text: good dive watch a little big to wear under a dress shirt but underwater an amazing watch good for diving if your in a pool or down in the ocean
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: and people who love big, heavy
customer_reviews.text: Its a big, heavy G-Shock geared toward divers, and people who love big, heavy, G-shock watches. If you love big, heavy G-Shocks, this is THE big, heavy G-Shock to get.
customer_reviews.author: OCDan

customer_reviews.title: This Frogman is the BOMB get it !!!! 👍
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this Frogman not the casio i grew up with, substantial quality build, serious piece of work. Customer Service was top notch👍 Update im so impressed with tihis Frogman im getting the Rangeman in green with negative display !!!
customer_reviews.author: Jlm

customer_reviews.title: This is a watch designed for hard use. Despite ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a watch designed for hard use. Despite lacking some of the more modern features of newer models (LED illuminator, sapphire lense, carbon fiber insert band, sensor suite) this is a rock solid, no nonsense watch built for any environment.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great watch but....
customer_reviews.text: I love the watch but it will take time to get used to the thickness of the watch catching on clothes or when you have to squeeze by in tight areas. the offset design is easy on the bending back on the wrist. The band sucks. The tongue of the watch band falls out of the little slot that is suppose to hold in the slack. plus the extra band of the watch catches on everything as well. It should have a Velcro tight band that does not catch on clothes etc. The cost is too high for what the watch is G-Shock has too many great watches that are a lot cheaper with the size I like.
customer_reviews.author: Yachtshot

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Watch for Surfing!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent watch for water activities, surfing, traveling, etc. looks great on the wrist too!
customer_reviews.author: psarvey

customer_reviews.title: Frogman, the pinnacle of G-Shock Acheivement
customer_reviews.text: You don't need a review to know this watch is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Vinson

customer_reviews.title: ... is about this watch but its by far my favorite G shock
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what it is about this watch but its by far my favorite G shock .I have 4 G shocks now. I just got it 2 days ago. I will do another review in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Ryback

customer_reviews.title: Love this Watch!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome watch and it is built solid with good weight.
customer_reviews.author: TCS

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 g shock watches this is my favorite nice looking and practicle
customer_reviews.author: redfairie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I collect all kinds of watches. From Rolex's to Timex's. This G-Shock is a winner!!
customer_reviews.author: Karim Hanna

customer_reviews.title: huge watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is giant. But after three days i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Zoso

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent watch, very rugged yet comfortable. Price was outstanding too!
customer_reviews.author: Blaze

customer_reviews.title: Best waterproof watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is just awesome. It was my dream to buy it, i got it at a great price, thanks to Amazon. Dont think twice before u buy a frogman.
customer_reviews.author: mohit e.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, very happy with this watch just as expected
customer_reviews.author: A. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Navy seal level watch
customer_reviews.text: "Frogman" "Frogmen" this watch only needs to change one letter to become the navy seal. Yeah, that's how good it is.
customer_reviews.author: Kloud He

customer_reviews.title: great price, and excellent features
customer_reviews.text: Solid watch, great price, and excellent features. Only negative is the screen size; wish it were a little easier to read. Definitely recommend this watch and watchtronics who sold me this watch was excellent to deal with. They were very responsive and helpful. A+
customer_reviews.author: ranger3

customer_reviews.title: I love my Frog!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite watch, hands down! I own many G Shocks, including the Rangeman(which is also amazing!) The Frogman is in a class by itself! And yes, it's a big watch, blah,blah,blah, if you are even considering the Frog, you already know that. You truly can't go wrong with the Frogman! Do yourself a HUGE favor, get this watch!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Arrived exactly on time. Watch is awesome and will be used every day for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: leigh burch

customer_reviews.title: Robust and Attractive Frogman
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Frogman at this model, I use to collect Frogman watches but sold them all,and regret it. So I purchased this one again and had missed owning one, glad I have one again. A great robust watch that is attractive yet reasonable in price. These are no longer made so if you want one get one while you can.
customer_reviews.author: Kevster

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome watch! I have gotten several compliments on it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome watch! I have gotten several compliments on it already, which is funny since I normaly wear a very expensive Tag :). I cant wait to go diving with it!
customer_reviews.author: Dc

customer_reviews.title: Watch works perfectly. Expected the packing to be a ...
customer_reviews.text: Watch works perfectly. Expected the packing to be a little different to the regular G shock boxes as it is part of the master of G collection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. Beat watch I've ever bought. So many features for the diver or your average Joe
customer_reviews.author: John J Mullins

product_meta.title: Casio Men's GWF1000 Frogman Black Solar Atomic G-Shock Watch
product_meta.description: Born from a dream of "creating a watch that never breaks." It was over 30 years ago, a CASIO engineer won the battle against the laws of nature. He designed a watch that would resist centrifugal and impact forces, as well as high water pressure. Since then, the name G-SHOCK has become a byword for independence and pushing the limits. G-SHOCK watches are the most durable digital and analog-digital watches in the industry, trusted by military personnel, law enforcement, surfers and outdoor enthusiasts around the world. Along with this, G-SHOCK is highly touted in the fashion world, worn by icons in hip-hop, sports, and design. With limited edition collaborations being released often, you can always find a G-SHOCK that matches your personality and style.
